item.title: Migrating a monolith application into microservices with single sign on
item.description: General Discussion   The Path to Microservices: A Journey of Innovation and Empowerment   In today’s fast-paced tech landscape, companies are continually seeking innovative ways to stay competitive and meet evolving customer demands.
